input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas - Owl Blue

Item features:
Full-bodied PJs with animal character embroidery
100% cotton
Elasticized trim for a comfy fit
Long sleeves for front and back legs to helps prevent shedding
Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry
input_text.Response A: Are you tired of seeing your dog running around the house in his underwear? Well, the Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas in owl blue might be just what he needs. These full-bodied PJs come with animal character embroidery and are made of 100% cotton. The elasticized trim ensures a comfortable fit, while long sleeves on both the front and back legs help to prevent shedding. And the best part? Your dog will be nice and cozy while he dreams of his next adventure. Machine wash cold and lay flat to dry.
input_text.Response B: These snuggly, comfy pajamas for dogs feature full-bodied styling with animal character embroidery to make your furry friend look even cuter. Made of soft, 100% cotton fabric, these PJs will keep your pooch warm on chilly nights. The elasticized trim gives a snug, comfortable fit, while long sleeves for front and back legs helps prevent shedding. Machine wash cold and lay flat to dry.

label_annotations.factors_a: I tried to visualise my dog running around the house with underwear but failed!  It did get my attention though so the A of AIDA was definitely achieved!  Question was unfair as I don't think you could implement AIDA from a written advert alone.
label_annotations.factors_b: Question was unfair as I don't think you could implement AIDA from a written advert alone.
label_annotations.feedback: Both A & B were good.  AIDA couldn't be reflected fully in the medium of a written article I feel.  A) took some liberties in describing the dog but it mentioned the blue colour which was better than B.
